content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_shell" command to install new packages on my computer. I used the "google" command to search for river restoration techniques and found the River Restoration Centre's Manual of
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "./new_directory/new_file.txt", "text": "This is some new text that I am writing to the new file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "./new_directory/new_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: This is some new text that I am writing to the new file.', type='action_result')]
"""
